ygData.subject: Re: Treehuggers?
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings, It would require some work on your part, but make a list. If someone wants to speak, they give you a /tell with a specific phrase in it ( Please add
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings,
It would require some work on your part, but make a list. If someone wants
to speak, they give you a /tell with a specific phrase in it ("Please add me
to the speaker list" or similar). You add them to the bottom of the list.
When their turn comes, they can make their point then sit back down. Limit
the speaker to one or two /says, and if they want to rebute, they resubmit
their names into the list.
-Teodor, Gnome Magician-
(Who probably won't make it this time, but loves the idea)


> Does anyone have any suggestions on how to keep a debate running smoothly?
> Maybe call on people to talk. I don't want it to be so crazy that noone
hears
> what anyone says.
